summary: Audio pitch detection app with visual note/frequency display
architectural_notes: UI displays detected notes and frequencies from ambient sound
App has a 'lock key' feature to freeze the detected key
Note/frequency display fields must maintain consistent height to prevent layout shift
known_issues: Note/frequency fields cause vertical layout shift when values change or are empty
